list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He’s very mean (with his money / over pay).

list_definition.definition: likely or intending to cause harm or annoyance

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It is mean to tell lies.

list_definition.definition: (of a house etc) of poor quality; humble
(of a statistic) having the middle position between two points, quantities etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: the mean value on a graph.

list_definition.definition: something that is midway between two opposite ends or extremes

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Three is the mean of the series one to five.

list_definition.definition: to (intend to) express, show or indicate

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: What do you mean by (saying/doing) that?
I meant to go to the exhibition but forgot
For whom was that letter meant?
He means (= is determined) to be a rich man some day.
